short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Wikipedia external links in a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open Wikipedia external links in a new tab without ctrl + click, cmd + click, right click + "open in a new tab".

This extension opens external links on Wikipedia articles in a new tab.
